title: Remove broken admin token bootstrap UI and keep email/password as sole admin login

requirements.summary: Remove the token-based first-time setup/bootstrap section from the admin login UI so only email/password login is presented.
acceptanceCriteria: On the /admin login screen, users no longer see inputs/buttons for "Admin Token", "User Token", or "Grant Admin Access".
The email/password login form remains visible and functional, and on success navigates to the admin dashboard (existing behavior in `AdminLayout.tsx`).

file_operations.description: Remove all token-bootstrap UI and logic from the unauthenticated admin login screen: delete the "First-Time Setup" section (Admin Token/User Token inputs and "Grant Admin Access" button), remove related state (adminToken/userToken), handler (handleBootstrap), and hook usage/import (useUnlockBootstrapAdmin) so email/password is the only admin access path shown. Ensure the email/password login success navigation to the admin dashboard remains unchanged.
